name: Just Go Down
description:
Joyce Huang, Chris Xu, Lawrence Xue

How to Play: 

Just Go Down! Duh! 

Move Slime using WASD keys. If you get stuck, eat the tiles in your way using the left, right, top, down arrow keys. There's a limit to how much you can eat at once before eating again so use it wisely! 

The levels are maps generated differently each time! Good Luck!
